definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
Campaign to Suppress Counterrevolutionaries (PRC political campaign from 1950-1952), abbr. to 鎮反運動|镇反运动[Zhen4 fan3 Yun4 dong4]
pinyin: Zhen4 ya1 Fan3 ge2 ming4 Yun4 dong4

sentences.english: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
sentences.chinese: 知識改變命運，英文成就未來。

sentences.english: However, the fate of teaser , your stock has fallen to 7 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 然而命運捉弄人，你的股票跌到7元了。

sentences.english: So let us seize it, not in fear,but in gladness.
sentences.chinese: 因此，讓我們毫無畏懼，滿心愉悅地把握命運。

sentences.english: For man is man or master of his fate.
sentences.chinese: 人根本那是人，是自己命運的主人。

sentences.english: Whenever sad time, god of destiny will be a silver pen on paper drawing a circle.
sentences.chinese: 每當悲傷一次，命運之神便會用銀筆在紙上畫一個圈。

sentences.english: O for my sake do you with Fortune chide.
sentences.chinese: 哦，請爲我把命運的女神詬讓。

sentences.english: Life is not a dream, destiny is held in our own hands.
sentences.chinese: 浮生並非若夢，命運還靠自己把握。

sentences.english: And that is the theme of War, the fortune of battles.
sentences.chinese: 就這一首戰之曲，說命運旋律。

sentences.english: But Fate does iron wedges drive.
And character, in the words of Heraclitus, determines fate.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉克利特曾經說過，性格決定命運。

sentences.english: Even the horses and the dogs have no better fate.
sentences.chinese: 就是馬和狗的命運也好不了多少。

sentences.english: Thy fate is the commen fate of all.
sentences.chinese: 你的命運和大家的一樣。

sentences.english: But its biggest achievement by far is the sense of responsibility bestowed upon players.
sentences.chinese: 本作最大的特點就是玩家決定主人公的善惡命運。

sentences.english: Fleeing the great flock that Destiny has folded.
sentences.chinese: 逃離了被命運圈起的巨大的羊羣。

sentences.english: You must realize that one day your existence will suffer the same fate.
sentences.chinese: 你必須意識到總有一天你的存在也會遭受相同的命運。

sentences.english: Only silent prayer, I should not have a sense of destiny, but how could I resist?
sentences.chinese: 只有默禱，我沒有命運感，但我怎麼能抗拒？

definition: to foreordain/to be bound to/to be destined to/to be doomed to/inevitably
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
in the end/after all is said and done
